languages.text: "Фурибундус ценен своей близостью к Зеву — вратам в {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империум{/g}. В первую очередь система известна Футфолом — главной опорной точкой для торговцев, каперов и Вольных Торговцев, путешествующих в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g}. Помимо этого в системе размещена закрытая для посторонних станция {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}, обращающаяся вокруг звезды".

traits.locale_text: "Фурибундус ценен своей близостью к Зеву — вратам в Империум. В первую очередь система известна Футфолом — главной опорной точкой для торговцев, каперов и Вольных Торговцев, путешенствующих в Просторе Коронус. Помимо этого в системе размещена закрытая для посторонних станция Адептус Механикус, обращающаяся вокруг звезды".

languages.text: "Furibundus is valuable due to its close proximity to the Maw — the gateway to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The system is mostly known for Footfall — the main base for merchants, privateers, and Rogue Traders traversing the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Additionally, the star itself is orbited by an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} station, which is off-limits to outsiders."
languages.original_text: "Фурибундус ценен своей близостью к Зеву — вратам в {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Империум{/g}. В первую очередь система известна Футфолом — главной опорной точкой для торговцев, каперов и Вольных Торговцев, путешествующих в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g}. Помимо этого в системе размещена закрытая для посторонних станция {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}, обращающаяся вокруг звезды".

traits.locale_text: "Furibundus is valuable due to is close proximity to the Maw — the gateway to the Imperium. Primarily, the system is famous because of Footfall — the main base for merchants, privateers and Rogue Traders traversing the Koronus Expanse. Additionally, the system houses an Adeptus Mechanicus station rotating the star, which is off-limits."

Primarily, the system is famous because of Footfall — the main base for merchants, privateers and Rogue Traders traversing the Koronus Expanse. Additionally, the system houses an Adeptus Mechanicus station rotating the star, which is off-limits."

"Furibundus is valuable due to its close proximity to the Maw — the gateway to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Additionally, the star itself is orbited by an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} station, which is off-limits to outsiders."

languages.text: «El valor de Furibundus radica en su proximidad a las Fauces, que hacen de puerta al {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. El sistema es conocido principalmente por Paso, la base central de los mercaderes, corsarios y Comerciantes Independientes que recorren la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Además, su estrella tiene en órbita una estación del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, aunque el acceso solo les esté permitido a sus miembros».
languages.original_text: "Furibundus is valuable due to its close proximity to the Maw — the gateway to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The system is mostly known for Footfall — the main base for merchants, privateers, and Rogue Traders traversing the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Additionally, the star itself is orbited by an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} station, which is off-limits to outsiders."

traits.locale_text: «El valor de Furibundus radica en su proximidad a las Fauces, que hacen de puerta al {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. El sistema es conocido principalmente por Paso, la base central de los mercaderes, corsarios y Comerciantes Independientes que recorren la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Además, su estrella tiene en órbita una estación del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, aunque el acceso solo les esté permitido a sus miembros».

languages.text: “怒焰星系靠近‘巨口’，那里是通往{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的门户。因此，这个星系很有价值。这个星系最著名的港口就是落脚港，所有打算穿越{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的商人、海盗，以及行商浪人，都会把这里当成据点。此外，怒焰星本身环绕着{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的空间站，外来者严禁进入。”
languages.original_text: "Furibundus is valuable due to its close proximity to the Maw — the gateway to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The system is mostly known for Footfall — the main base for merchants, privateers, and Rogue Traders traversing the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Additionally, the star itself is orbited by an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} station, which is off-limits to outsiders."

traits.locale_text: “怒焰星系靠近‘巨口’，那里是通往{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}的门户。因此，这个星系很有价值。这个星系最著名的港口就是落脚港，所有打算穿越{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯星域{/g}的商人、海盗，以及行商浪人，都会把这里当成据点。此外，怒焰星本身环绕着{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}的空间站，外来者严禁进入。”

languages.text: 「フリブンダスは、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}への玄関口であるマウに近いため重宝します。この星系は主にフットフォールが有名ですね。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}を横断する商人、民間船、自由開拓者の拠点になります。それから、惑星の周りを部外者厳禁の{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}のステーションが周っているのです」
languages.original_text: "Furibundus is valuable due to its close proximity to the Maw — the gateway to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The system is mostly known for Footfall — the main base for merchants, privateers, and Rogue Traders traversing the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Additionally, the star itself is orbited by an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} station, which is off-limits to outsiders."

traits.locale_text: 「フリブンダスは、{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}帝国{/g}への玄関口であるマウに近いため重宝します。この星系は主にフットフォールが有名ですね。{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}を横断する商人、民間船、自由開拓者の拠点になります。それから、惑星の周りを部外者厳禁の{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}のステーションが周っているのです」

languages.text: "Furibundus ist wegen seiner unmittelbaren Nähe zum Schlund von Bedeutung – dem Tor zum {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Am bekanntesten dort dürfte wohl Footfall sein – die Hauptbasis für Händler, Freibeuter und Freihändler, die in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} tätig sind. Außerdem wird der Stern selbst von einer Station des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} umkreist, zu der Fremde aber keinen Zutritt haben."
languages.original_text: "Furibundus is valuable due to its close proximity to the Maw — the gateway to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The system is mostly known for Footfall — the main base for merchants, privateers, and Rogue Traders traversing the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Additionally, the star itself is orbited by an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} station, which is off-limits to outsiders."

traits.locale_text: "Furibundus ist wegen seiner unmittelbaren Nähe zum Schlund von Bedeutung – dem Tor zum {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Am bekanntesten dort dürfte wohl Footfall sein – die Hauptbasis für Händler, Freibeuter und Freihändler, die in der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} tätig sind. Außerdem wird der Stern selbst von einer Station des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} umkreist, zu der Fremde aber keinen Zutritt haben."

languages.text: « La valeur de Furibundus réside dans sa situation avantageuse à proximité de la Gueule, la porte de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Ce système est surtout connu pour Castel, la base principale des commerçants, corsaires et libres-marchands qui traversent les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. De plus, une station de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, interdite d'accès aux non-initiés, gravite autour de son soleil. »
languages.original_text: "Furibundus is valuable due to its close proximity to the Maw — the gateway to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The system is mostly known for Footfall — the main base for merchants, privateers, and Rogue Traders traversing the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Additionally, the star itself is orbited by an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} station, which is off-limits to outsiders."

traits.locale_text: « La valeur de Furibundus réside dans sa situation avantageuse à proximité de la Gueule, la porte de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. Ce système est surtout connu pour Castel, la base principale des commerçants, corsaires et libres-marchands qui traversent les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. De plus, une station de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, interdite d'accès aux non-initiés, gravite autour de son soleil. »

languages.text: "Furibundus, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk'a{/g} açılan geçit olan Ağız'a yakınlığı nedeniyle kıymetlidir. Sistem en çok {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nde{/g} seyahat eden tüccarların, izinli korsanların ve Hür Tacirlerin ana üssü konumundaki Binliman'la ünlüdür. Ayrıca yıldızın yörüngesinde, yabancılara açık olmayan bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} istasyonu vardır."
languages.original_text: "Furibundus is valuable due to its close proximity to the Maw — the gateway to the {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}Imperium{/g}. The system is mostly known for Footfall — the main base for merchants, privateers, and Rogue Traders traversing the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Additionally, the star itself is orbited by an {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} station, which is off-limits to outsiders."

traits.locale_text: "Furibundus, {g|Encyclopedia:Imperium}İmparatorluk{/g}'a açılan geçit olan Ağız'a yakınlığı nedeniyle değerli bir yer. Sistem en çok {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nde seyahat eden tüccarların, izinli korsanların ve Hür Tacirlerin ana üssü konumundaki Binliman'la tanınır. Ayrıca direkt olarak yıldızın yörüngesinde, ziyaretçilere açık olmayan bir {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} istasyonu bulunur."
